overview: Live in Paris is the first full Raphael Saadiq concert release on DVD. Featuring songs from his GrammyÂ®-nominated album The Way I See It, this 2009 concert captures Raphael Saadiq in one of his finest moments, on stage in Paris, France.  Recorded at le Bataclan, Paris, France on July 11th, 2009.
title: Raphael Saadiq - Live in Paris
